Detailed Description

Average charge velocity, mobility along the field, and site current.

The average velocity is calculated from occupation probabilities and charge trajectory,

A symmetrized local current through site is defined as

A forward local current through site is defined as (Phys. Rev. B 79, 085203, 2009)

where .
